products.title: The Iconic Mesh Polo Shirt - All Fits
products.description: An American style standard since 1972, the Polo shirt has been imitated but never matched. Over the decades, Ralph Lauren has reimagined his signature style in a wide array of colors and fits, yet all retain the quality and attention to detail of the iconic original. This relaxed version is made from our highly breathable cotton mesh, which offers a textured look and a soft feel.

products.title: Soft Cotton Polo Shirt - All Fits
products.description: An American style standard since 1972, the Polo shirt has been imitated but never matched. Over the decades, Ralph Lauren has reimagined his signature style in a wide array of colors and fits, yet all retain the quality and attention to detail of the iconic original. This long-sleeve version is made from luxe cotton interlock with an ultrasoft finish.

products.title: Mesh Long-Sleeve Polo Shirt – All Fits
products.description: An American style standard since 1972, the Polo shirt has been imitated but never matched. Over the decades, Ralph Lauren has reimagined his signature style in a wide array of colors and fits, yet all retain the quality and attention to detail of the iconic original. This relaxed version is made from our highly breathable cotton mesh, which offers a textured look and a soft feel.

products.title: Original Fit Mesh Polo Shirt
products.description: An American style standard since 1972, the Polo shirt has been imitated but never matched. Over the decades, Ralph Lauren has reimagined his signature style in a wide array of colors and fits, yet all retain the quality and attention to detail of the initial icon. Treated for a timeworn look, this version is cut in our Original Fit, which is slightly more relaxed at the shoulder than our Classic Fit and has a longer back length.

products.title: Custom Slim Fit Big Pony Mesh Polo Shirt
products.description: An American style standard since 1972, the Polo shirt has been imitated but never matched. Over the decades, Ralph Lauren has reimagined his signature style in a wide array of colors and fits, yet all retain the quality and attention to detail of the iconic original. This version is cut for a trim silhouette and finished with a '3' appliqué—the number typically worn by a polo team's strongest player.

products.title: Custom Slim Fit Featherweight Polo Shirt
products.description: An American style standard since 1972, the Polo shirt has been imitated but never matched. Over the decades, Ralph Lauren has reimagined his signature style in a wide array of colors and fits, yet all retain the quality and attention to detail of the iconic original. This trim version is cut from an ultrathin layer of our most lightweight cotton mesh, making it the perfect shirt for transitional days or when you want a comfortable layer underneath sweaters or jackets.

products.title: Cotton V-Neck Cardigan
products.description: You can keep this soft, lightweight layer in your rotation year-round thanks to its finely knit, premium cotton.

products.title: Luxury Jersey Quarter-Zip Pullover
products.description: This quarter-zip pullover is made from supersmooth jersey and finished with our signature embroidered Pony.

products.title: Washable Cashmere Crewneck Sweater
products.description: Offering the timeless luxury of cashmere, this wear-with-anything sweater has been specially treated for easy care while maintaining its breathability and sumptuous texture.

products.title: Washable Cashmere Hooded Sweater
products.description: This hooded sweater achieves a luxurious texture by combining easy-care cashmere and a waffle-knit technique.

products.title: Mesh-Knit Cotton Crewneck Sweater
products.description: We've reinterpreted our iconic mesh fabric with premium cotton yarn to create this lightweight sweater.

products.title: Mesh-Knit Cotton Quarter-Zip Sweater
products.description: We've reinterpreted our iconic mesh fabric with premium cotton yarn to create this lightweight sweater.

products.title: PS200 Sneaker
products.description: A contemporary take on the classic trail sneaker, the PS200 features a TPU-reinforced heel, a molded EVA midsole, and a substantial treaded rubber sole. It's finished with tubular logo-detailed laces that cinch at the heel.

products.title: PS100 High-Top Sneaker
products.description: Inspired by classic basketball shoes of the '90s, the high-top silhouette of the PS100 is constructed with a substantial EVA midsole and TPU reinforcement at the heel. Finished with a hook-and-loop strap at the vamp, this version is paneled in leather, mesh, and faux suede and detailed with iconic Polo Sport graphics.

products.title: Trackster 200II Knit Sneaker
products.description: An updated version of Polo's retro-inspired sneaker with modern performance technology, the Trackster 200II is designed with an engineered knit upper. Accented with leather at the toe and heel, it features a premium EVA midsole, a substantial rubber outsole, and a TPU-reinforced heel.

products.title: Trackster 200 Sneaker
products.description: The Trackster 200 is a retro-inspired sneaker designed with modern performance technology. Paneled with suede and mesh, it features a premium EVA midsole, a substantial rubber outsole, and a TPU-reinforced heel.

products.title: PS100 High-Top Sneaker
products.description: Inspired by classic basketball shoes of the '90s, the high-top silhouette of the PS100 is constructed with a substantial EVA midsole and TPU reinforcement at the heel. Finished with a hook-and-loop strap at the vamp, this version is paneled in leather, mesh, and faux suede and detailed with iconic Polo Sport graphics.

products.title: PS200 Suede & Mesh Sneaker
products.description: A contemporary take on the classic trail sneaker, the PS200 features a TPU-reinforced heel, a molded EVA midsole, and a substantial treaded rubber sole. Paneled with suede and mesh, it's finished with tubular laces that cinch at the heel.

products.title: Plaid Tiered Cotton Halter Dress
products.description: Inspired by archival Polo garments, this halter dress is cut from airy cotton with a madras-inspired plaid motif. Smocking accentuates the waist and the tiered skirt.

products.title: Floral Ruffle-Trim Linen Dress
products.description: This warm-weather dress merges ruffle trim along the neckline with a delicate floral pattern printed on airy linen. A paneled construction at the skirt enhances its sweeping volume.

products.title: Floral Flutter-Sleeve Maxidress
products.description: Cut for a fluid drape from delicately crinkled fabric, this floral maxidress is designed with a button front and sheer flutter sleeves.

products.title: Linen Tiered Midi Shirtdress
products.description: Channeling pure Polo style, this shirtdress is made from breathable, lightweight linen. It's finished with a self belt at the tiered skirt.

products.title: Battenberg-Lace Linen Dress
products.description: This romantic, bohemian-inspired off-the-shoulder linen dress combines eyelet embroidery with intricate Battenberg lace detailing.

products.title: Block-Print Tie-Cuff Cotton Shirtdress
products.description: Printed all over with the season's block-inspired motif, this fit-and-flare shirtdress gets a modern update with self-ties that cinch the cuffs of its blouson sleeves.

products.title: Silk Ikat-Print Pochette
products.description: Designed with a removable chain strap and a calfskin drawstring closure, this convertible pochette is handcrafted by skilled artisans. Rendered from silk shantung, and lined with lambskin, this bag is distinguished by one of the season's signature patterns inspired by designs traditional to Uzbekistan, Tajikistan and cultures throughout Asia. The interwoven global history of ikat techniques—from as early as the 10th century—holds cherished historical symbolism and varied origins across cultures in the Middle East, Asia, Africa and Latin America.

products.title: Cable-Knit Welington Shoulder Bag
products.description: Part of the Ralph Lauren Welington collection, this shoulder bag is beautifully handcrafted by master artisans in Italy from full-grain calfskin finished with a lambskin lining. A modern reflection of Ralph Lauren's equestrian heritage, it boasts a polished palladium-plated stirrup buckle at the front fold-over flap. The piece's studied construction features an adjustable shoulder strap, an interior slip pocket, and hand-painted edges, elevated by cable-knit panels that are created using a tie-dye technique, which highlight Mr. Lauren's dedication to fine workmanship.

products.title: Calfskin Welington Shoulder Bag
products.description: Part of the Ralph Lauren Welington collection, this shoulder bag is beautifully handcrafted by master artisans in Italy from calfskin and finished with a lambskin lining. A modern reflection of Ralph Lauren's equestrian heritage, it boasts a polished stirrup buckle engraved with 'Ralph Lauren' at the front fold-over flap. The piece's studied construction features an adjustable shoulder strap, an interior slip pocket, and hand-painted edges, which highlights Mr. Lauren's dedication to fine workmanship.

products.title: Glen Plaid Welington Shoulder Bag
products.description: Part of the Ralph Lauren Welington collection, this shoulder bag is beautifully handcrafted by master artisans in Italy from calfskin and a Glen plaid fabrication woven from a wool blend. A modern reflection of Ralph Lauren's equestrian heritage, it boasts a polished palladium-plated stirrup buckle—engraved with 'Ralph Lauren'—at the front fold-over flap. The piece's studied construction features an adjustable shoulder strap, an interior slip pocket, and hand-painted edges, which highlight Mr. Lauren's dedication to fine workmanship.

products.title: Leather Mini Fringe Crossbody Bag
products.description: This miniature drawstring crossbody bag merges full-grain pebbled leather with swinging fringe trim and our signature debossed logo at the center front.

products.title: Block-Print Tie-Cuff Cotton Shirtdress
products.description: Printed all over with the season's block-inspired motif, this fit-and-flare shirtdress gets a modern update with self-ties that cinch the cuffs of its blouson sleeves.

products.title: Myles Embellished Ikat-Print Blazer
products.description: Drawing inspiration from an archival Collection piece, the Myles blazer is rendered from silk shantung—a plain-weave silk woven with ultrafine slub yarn to create a rustic look and a soft hand. This jacket is cut for a long, lean silhouette fashioned with besom pockets and shawl lapels. It features one of the season's archival ikat-inspired prints that's engineered to achieve a perfectly symmetrical look, then embellished with shimmering sequins. Prints and patterns from this season's collection are inspired by designs traditional to Uzbekistan, Tajikistan and cultures throughout Asia. The interwoven global history of ikat techniques—from as early as the 10th century—holds cherished historical symbolism and varied origins across cultures in the Middle East, Asia, Africa and Latin America.

products.title: Surplus Denim Jacket
products.description: This iteration of Polo's surplus-inspired jacket is rendered from 7.5 oz. right-hand cotton twill, for a light weight and a soft, drapey hand. Featuring a medium-indigo wash, it's also specially treated to create a timeworn look of an aged favorite.

products.title: Quilted Patchwork Trucker Jacket
products.description: Cut for an oversize silhouette, this vintage-inspired trucker jacket features allover patchworking that unites subtly distressed denim squares with the season's quilted motifs.

products.title: Packable Water-Repellent Hooded Jacket
products.description: Printed all over with the season's block-inspired motif, this fit-and-flare shirtdress gets a modern update with self-ties that cinch the cuffs of its blouson sleeves.

products.title: High-Pile Ripstop-Trim Jacket
products.description: Printed all over with the season's block-inspired motif, this fit-and-flare shirtdress gets a modern update with self-ties that cinch the cuffs of its blouson sleeves.

products.title: Polo Sport Ripstop Poncho
products.description: This durable ripstop poncho features a drawstring hood and is detailed with our iconic Polo Sport logo. The self-packable design makes it perfect for travel.
